body_content.explanation: to say or do something that shows a complete change of opinion or behaviour:
examples: He has done an about-face on both issues.
After her stint in jail for drug possession, she's done an about-face and gotten clean.
The Supreme Court did an about face and curtailed the judges' powers.

body_content.explanation: to suddenly turn and face in the opposite direction:
examples: I had to do an about-face and turn right instead of left.
At the bottom of the steps he did an about face and stood looking up at her.
